head.supplied: The ¶ Naturalhistory Club ¶ of ¶ Bremen ¶ has in its session of 4 May 1868 elected Dr Ferdinand Mueller in Melbourne as its corresponding member in grateful recognition of his outstanding achievements...

div.p: From the Naturwissenschafter Verein zu Bremen
RB MSS M 199, box 5, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: hat in seiner Sitzung vom 4 Mai 1868

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Herrn Dr. Ferdinand Müller in Melbourne

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p:
in dankbarer Anerkennung von dessen hervorragen den Leistungen zur Erforschung d
der. austral. Flora

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
p.seg: zu seinem correspondirenden Mitgliede ernannt, worüber dies Diplom ausgestellt wird.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: has in its session of 4 May 1868 elected Dr Ferdinand Mueller in Melbourne as its corresponding member in grateful recognition of his outstanding achievements in researching the Australian flora, whereby this Diploma is issued.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.075in; padding-right: 0.075in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;

cell.p:
Dr Buchenau
See F. Buchenau to M, 29 May 1868.
